name: Nightwards, Heartwards
description:
Explore your inner world.

Nightwards, Heartwards is a short game made for LD38, by three people in three days (Dustin Connor and Florencia Minuzzi from Tea-Powered Games, and Victor Ojuel).

Explore your inner self by moving Heartwards or Mindwards, Nightwards or Daywards, representing different states of mind. Along the way, you will encounter other travellers who accompany you while you remain in their comfort zone. Become who you need to be in time to fulfil tasks, form bonds between travellers to make journeying faster and easier, and ultimately settle as the person you want to be.

All music and sounds are from freesound.org
